sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>IfscDetails</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {


    var ifsc_code1 = request.pathParams.code;
    // implement resource here
    // var queryP = request.queryParams;
    // var u_ifsc = queryP.u_ifsc;
    // var bankD = queryP.bankD;

    var body = [];

var bt = new GlideRecord('u_demo_rbi_data');
bt.addQuery('u_ifsc',ifsc_code1);
bt.query();
while(bt.next())
{

	var obj ={

		IFSC : bt.getValue('u_ifsc'),
		name: bt.getValue('u_bank'),
                 state:bt.getValue('u_state'),
                 std: bt.getValue('u_std_code'),
                branch: bt.getValue('u_branch')


	};
	body.push(obj);



}
response.setBody(body);








    // if (u_ifsc) {
    //     var gr = new GlideRecord('u_demo_rbi_data');
    //     gr.addQuery('u_ifsc', u_ifsc);
    //     //gr.addQuery('u_bank', bankD);
    //     gr.query();

    //     while (gr.next()) {

    //         var obj = {
    //             IFSC: gr.getValue('u_ifsc'),
    //             name: gr.getValue('u_bank'),
    //             state: gr.getValue('u_state'),
    //             std: gr.getValue('u_std_code'),
    //             branch: gr.getValue('u_branch')
    //         };


    //         body.push(obj);

        }

    //     response.setBody(body);
    // } else if (bankD) {
    //     var gr1 = new GlideRecord('u_demo_rbi_data');
    //     //gr.addQuery('u_ifsc', u_ifsc);
    //     gr1.addQuery('u_bank', bankD);
    //     gr1.query();

    //     while (gr1.next()) {

    //         var obj1 = {
    //             IFSC: gr1.getValue('u_ifsc'),
    //             name: gr1.getValue('u_bank'),
    //             state: gr1.getValue('u_state'),
    //             std: gr1.getValue('u_std_code'),
    //             branch: gr1.getValue('u_branch')
    //         };


    //         body.push(obj1);

    //     }

    //     response.setBody(body);
    // }







)(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/708337/demo_bank/{code}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/{code}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-16 08:45:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>2eb5ff67471f42103761bb30116d43a6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>IfscDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_2eb5ff67471f42103761bb30116d43a6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-18 11:05:53</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Demo_Bank">7f253fe3471f42103761bb30116d437a</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
